name: The Crypt (Paul.Ly)
description:
- The Crypt-

As a gravedigger, imagine waking up a morning and peacefully inspect your graveyard but the graves are broken, dead body turned undead and savage vampires squat your crypt ? It would be upset isn't it ?

Go dive into the crypt, take back your tools and hunt all those  vampires !

30 min post ludum build:

Fix a hardlock that occured after a death while fighting (not sur if correctly fix, GL if you face it !)

Controls :

-WASD / Left Joystick -------- Move
-A / Space ---------------------- Roll
-X / Mouse Left Click --------- Attack
